name: Omnimancer
description:
Omnimancer is a fantasy interactive fiction game with RPG elements ranging from character customization to dialogue checks to turn-based combat. The game's narrative follows a customizable protagonist and their companions as they investigate a string of mysterious attacks and their connection to the continent's oldest legend.

The game's development is ongoing. As such, currently, only the Prologue and one of eight planned chapters are playable, constituting roughly 50,000 words of content.
